experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.subtitle: National University of Singapore
workDescription: Analyzed voter salience and contextual biases to design data-driven political strategy insights.
Built a probabilistic multilingual model on **600,000+** human responses for citizen preference prediction.
Optimized BERTopic-based topic extraction to segment and analyze large multilingual corpora.

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.subtitle: Chi SquareX, Bengaluru
workDescription: Built a credit risk classifier on the German Credit dataset to predict loan defaults.
Performed EDA and feature engineering using Chi-square, ANOVA, and PCA for multicollinearity handling.
Benchmarked **8** models and achieved best performance with LightGBM: **F1 0.86** (test) and **0.83** (5-fold CV).
Tuned LightGBM with GridSearchCV for learning rate, depth, and estimators under class imbalance constraints.

experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.subtitle: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur
workDescription: Developed an end-to-end climate diffusion pipeline for long-horizon SST anomaly generation.
Implemented conditional DDPM with attention-augmented UNet for seasonally conditioned global SST maps.
Built an autoregressive SST generation and evaluation pipeline validated with spatial and temporal correlations.
Reached average spatial correlation of **0.982** across training runs.

experiences.title: Research Publication (Under Review)
experiences.subtitle: A Comparative Study of Generative Models as Surrogates of Earth System Models to Simulate Global SST
workDescription: Co-authored comparative evaluation of GAN, VAE, and DDPM for long-horizon global SST generation using CMIP6 GISS data.
Demonstrated GAN-based emulations as the most consistent with observed SST patterns in this study.
